@maxyyyy

To check rearm count, type "slmgr -dlv" in command prompt.

Watermark Remover: http://7pmtech.com/threads/windows-8-watermark-remover.1829/

Run and restart Explorer. You have to run it at every boot.

there's still a way to use this blocked product key on 64bit Windows 8 Enterprise/Pro VL, go to cmd, run as admin type the ff: slmgr /ipk PF9TR-KNB98-T7JPF-TWF8W-F3G7C , press enter, after that type in slui 4. press enter. if you got the same set of numbers on blocks 1-9, then you should be able to use the codes shown on blocks A-H. remember this is for 64 bit Windows 8 Enterprise/Pro VL. refer to the pic on the link and just enter the numbers. http://i778.photobucket.com/albums/yy62/laxluster/CaptureF3G7Cx64.jpg
no need to phone in Microsoft by the way, choose United Kingdom for the country.
